Posts.Content: Wish i was near enough to give you a proper hug & make it all better,but i aint & i can't so this is the best i can do xx
Posts.Title: re occurance

Posts.Content: Sending you big hugs Ali & i have everything crossed for you xx
Posts.Title: re occurance

Posts.Content: Hi Amanda Bless you,there always seems to be something doesn't there,hope you soon get the surgery done & are back to normal again xx
Posts.Title: Something else now

Posts.Content: Mine rang once to tell me i was anemic & needed to get in touch with my doctor for iron tablets,shame she wasted a call as they'd rung me 2 days befor to tell me there was a prescription waiting for me,like others have said befor me,you get more help from people on this site xx
Posts.Title: BCN

Posts.Content: Hi George hope you don't mind me doing this but there's a young lady on the family & friends forum that's asking about what all the letters & numbers mean on her boyfriends diagnosis,it's Becca on my fiances got cancer xx
Posts.Title: dreamthief,somebody needs your help

Posts.Content: Number 3  If there's anything you need please ask,what they mean is,but can you make sure somebody else please as i really don't mean what i just said And number 16  you're such an inspiration to me,what the f**k is that one all about,how can a moody, over weight,wonky boobed,sweaty blubbering wreck possibly inspire anybody xx
Posts.Title: Angry !

Posts.Content: Dad's aint much better,when i told mine i was on my way home after my biopsy he said did it hurt,well what do you think,i had my tit squashed nearly flat & needles stuck in it,oh,i didn't realise they stuck needles in & this was from a bloke that had biopsy done on his prostate & bowel xx
Posts.Title: Angry !

Posts.Content: 29 Flipping heck Carol,you went a bit overboard when you plucked your eyebrows  me under my breath f**k off dick head but sweetly replied no love treatment had a big hand So i shaved what little bits were left off,oh i didn't realise that could happen xx
Posts.Title: Angry !

Posts.Content: I know that speach well,i was ask "what do you want me to do darling" "could you hoover right through the house please" we have a little 3 up 2 down semi "what,even the stairs" "yes dear,even the stairs" 30 minutes later "do you realise how difficult it is hoovering the stairs" xx
Posts.Title: Angry !

Posts.Content: I agree with Francis,a book would be brilliant I've always had a warped sense of humour but since my diagnosis it's got worse & i see something funny in a situation that shouldn't have any humour in it (according to the latest scientific research that may be a sign of dementia)  xx
Posts.Title: Angry !

Posts.Content: I love that expression,i use it all the time  xx
Posts.Title: Angry !

Posts.Content: Hi thank you,she sounds so lost & desperate bless her & i didn't know what to tell her & instantly thought of George as he's helped me in the past xx
Posts.Title: dreamthief,somebody needs your help

Posts.Content: Hi Julie What a lovely post & a lovely thing that your daughter is doing I too am a survivor,i've recently had my 4 year mammogram & am anxiously waiting my results letter To celebrate 3 years i had the breast cancer ribbon tattooed above my scar & hopefully next year to celebrate being told to push off by the hospital i will have survivor done under it Good luck to all on this journey  Love & hugs Carol xx
Posts.Title: I am a survivor!!

Posts.Content: I still eat what i fancy when i fancy it & if that means chocolate cake for breakfast then so be it what will be will be whatever i do or eat i also like a glass of wine or a shot of honey jack daniels & for a special treat dissarano in cherry coke, tastes just like cherry bakewell tart Love Carol xx
Posts.Title: I am reading lots of info re diet and did not realise a change was...

Posts.Content: Hi Fiona i didn't change my diet,all i did was be more healthy & eat less rubbish but ideas & thinking change over the years so maybe i'm not the best person to be answering you,my nurse always told me to eat little & often & to eat what i wanted when i wanted love Carol xx
Posts.Title: I am reading lots of info re diet and did not realise a change was...

Posts.Content: That's brilliant,i'm so pleased for you xx
Posts.Title: A big step today

Posts.Content: Happy birthday to you,happy birthday to you,happy birthday Ali Owl,happy birthday to you Have a lovely day  Love & hugs xx
Posts.Title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY

Posts.Content: Hello Ali How did it go with the blood & oncologist xx
Posts.Title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY

Posts.Content: Trust you to have something else to worry about but like we said yesterday,we're still here to moan about it xx
Posts.Title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY

Posts.Content: Fantastic Helen,i had mine in May & am now looking ahead to 5 with fear & excitement in equal measure xx
Posts.Title: 4 years on

Posts.Content: That's the bit i'm dreading,after 5 years of being looked after who will i turn to,i am,however,very much looking forward to my street party to celebrate & thank everybody that was there for me xx
Posts.Title: 4 years on

Posts.Content: Hi Gina Good luck tomorrow,i remember the night befor my results very well,i spent half the night walking up & down stairs & the other half sobbing in the bathroom so i didn't wake Vince,like Lola said it's yhe fear of the unknown that's the worst & once we knew what we were up against we just dealt with every hurdle as we came to it Good luck tomorrow & with all future treatments xx
Posts.Title: One more day to go.

Posts.Content: Well done to you all,what a lovely photo,enjoy your evening xx
Posts.Title: Race for Life done and dusted ....

Posts.Content: Hi I wish i could tell you what will happen at your appointment but everybody has different things that need discussing,when i went to see my oncologist after radiotherapy had finished it was for her to tell me that as far as she was concerned all was well & i was being handed back to the breast unit & she hoped she would never see me again,fingers crossed you will get the information you want when you go xx
Posts.Title: Seeing Oncologist - what will it involve?

Posts.Content: Brilliant news ladies xx
Posts.Title: Two year milestone reached

Posts.Content: Gillywiggs please stay here with us 3 years ago i was as low as i could possibly have been & was at the stage of thinking that the family had enough to cope with without me on the list & they would be better off without me to add to their worries,oh how i wish i'd had access to this site & all these wonderful people,believe me George meant no critisism or ill feelings to you,he is one of the kindest people i have had the pleasure to talk to & his wealth of knowledge is amazing I have had counselling & will openly admit that i have been on antidepressants since then & i thank the doctor for this as no way could i cope without them Life stinks,we all know that but there is some good & when you look back on your cancer journey no matter how rough the begining was the road gets easier & there will be lots of good & happy memories xx
Posts.Title: Can good things come from having Cancer?

Posts.Content: Hi Maggie I think we must live in different counties as most of my men have been the pits & then along came him indoors,i was only going to go out with once to shut his mate up who said we'd be perfect together & 13 years later i feel he was right I wondered where all my exs went & now you've said about the men in India you've solved that mystery for me xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: Oh Judith of course you're not being too fussy & why should we be fussy,we girls deserve the best of everything,maybe you should give the ramblers a go,even if there's nobody that takes your eye there could be somebody lurking about where they meet up & if you're lucky that will be in a pub! Men are a strange breed aren't they,i sometimes wonder how their minds work  xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: Sounds like we all agree then girls,in moderation a bit of what you fancy does you good,trouble is at my age i'm too old & slow to catch what i fancy xx
Posts.Title: Measures to prevent breast cancer recurrence

Posts.Content: Hi Tilly i've read numerous things about causes,recurrence etc due to any amount of things,everybody has their own way of doing things,i went along the path of if i fancy it i'll have it,i never changed my diet& i still enjoy a little tipple now & again,others will tell you that they went down a different path & what they did,i would say you do what you feel is the right thing for you,if you're unsure talk to your GP or a member of your breast care team I wish you well on your journey xx
Posts.Title: Measures to prevent breast cancer recurrence

Posts.Content: You always manage to make me smile 58 is no age,i'm not far behind you,not so many years ago i would have been planning my retirement, no such luck now & on days like today i come home thinking "bloody hell,i could have another 10 years of this" Maybe you should think about the understudy now & not the leading man but on the other hand why settle for second best,maybe between us we can find a way to rid one of them of the other half xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: I'm so pleased i didn't offend,people have been so kind on this site & i would hate to upset anybody I know where some of them have their brains located & it's not a place i care to look too often!! xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: Hi Lizzie i have spoken to some wonderful people on this site,i just wish it had been 7 years ago when our lives with cancer started the best thing to come out of this is the friendship that has developed between me & our neighbour,4 years ago we were just on saying hello terms but are now really good friends & at times think more like sisters than friends,she is there with me every step of the way Love Carol xx
Posts.Title: Can good things come from having Cancer?

Posts.Content: Hi Sarah Nice to hear from you & find out how you are,am really pleased to see you're doing so well,good luck with the fundraising,please let me know when you're doing it & how i can make a donation Love & hugs xx
Posts.Title: Giving something back

Posts.Content: Dad's doing really good all things considered,just been out for a meal with my brother & went to feed kittens & Polly & there's a hedgehog asleep in their kennel at the side of the old washing up bowl they sleep in,by the look of things i would say this arrangement has been going on for a while,we have taken 2 of the kittens today to their new owners,i was ok when we left them but had a few tears when Jacqueline txt to let me know that they had settled in,had a nose round,a sleep & were stuffing their faces,so pleased they've gone to a good home,my friends husband is allergic to cats but she keeps saying she's having one of our kittens,we shall have to wait & see what happens xx
Posts.Title: Giving something back

Posts.Content: Isn't it amazing how you can go off on a tangent,3 days ago we were discussing antidepressants (how i do love mine) & here we are now on the subject of dreadful exs & trips to India,furthest i'll be going this year is a day trip London xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: Morning Sarah was a bit busy last night organising taking kittens to Jacqualine,things are good this end,i've had my 4 year all clear,changed my job,gained a cat that presented us with 5 beautiful kittens & dad has cancer again but is responding well to chemo,now on my way to work,so pleased to hear you're doing well & it's lovely to see you back on here with us again Love & hugs xx
Posts.Title: Giving something back

Posts.Content: Sorry Judith,hope i didn't offend with last post,didn't see the bit about your ex & pubs till i'd hit post xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: What cute Kitties,i just want to scoop them up & cry in there fur today Nobody should ever give up on finding their soul mate,after a string of crap relationships with some of the most horrible men in the county at the age of 44 i finally found the man i want to spend the rest of my life with,somewhere out there is a Jack for every Jill xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: Thank you,thank you & thank you again,that's my favourite film,might have to get it out & have a watch tomorrow,there's only so much daytime telly & black & white films i can take,roll on saturday & back to work Ali,can't believe you didn't know that my lost boy was in 24 xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: Hi Tilly i've read numerous things about causes,recurrence etc due to any amount of things,everybody has their own way of doing things,i went along the path of if i fancy it i'll have it,i never changed my diet& i still enjoy a little tipple now & again,others will tell you that they went down a different path & what they did,i would say you do what you feel is the right thing for you,if you're unsure talk to your GP or a member of your breast care team I wish you well on your journey xx
Posts.Title: Measures to prevent breast cancer recurrence

Posts.Content: Well,what a lovely evening looking at pictures,i shall go to bed now & hopefully have a good nights sleep & some lovely dreams xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: What a lovely start to the day,Kiefer Sutherland,Johnny Depp & proper scottish oatcakes with marmalade & that handsome cat for breakfast Thanks Judith,you've made my day xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: Sounds like we all agree then girls,in moderation a bit of what you fancy does you good,trouble is at my age i'm too old & slow to catch what i fancy xx
Posts.Title: Measures to prevent breast cancer recurrence

Posts.Content: Hi Maggiemay I won't go into all my history (too long & far too boring) but due to a number of events over the last 7 years i was given antidepressants 3 years ago & there's no way i could function normally without them at the moment,my gp did start to reduce my dose with a view to coming off them but due to events this year i know i'm not in a posisition mentally,to be able to keep me calm without them Hope this has helped you xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: This is a time when we have to be selfish & think about ourselves I hope your doctor is as sympathetic & helpful as mine was xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: That reminds me of the day we took one of our old cats to get him "sorted" he came home & fell asleep in his dinner xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: I'm bored,me bums numb,me foot hurts,there's no chocolate in the house Pleeeeeease can i have Kiefer Sutherland xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: Just the thought of him in that long coat in lost boys is enough to make me smile & gaze longingly into the distance,good job we don't all like the same Funny how we can go off at a tangent isn't it xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: Cheers Ali That's some big cat he's got hold of,you'd know if that jumped on your bed in the night xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: Thanks Judith,that's made me feel much better,i shall come here again to gaze with hope at those pictures xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: Yummylicious pictures & thankfully him indoors is out tonight so i can linger on here all night if i wish xx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: Thank you so much,i'm going down either tomorrow or monday night to have a look at all the stuff they gave him to read,mum said something about him taking tablets at home so i need to see for myself what it says xx
Posts.Title: Confused daughter

Posts.Content: Hi Bunty-ann So sorry you've had to join us here but this is the best place to come for support & advice,unfortunately i can't say how long the pain will last as we all heal at different speeds,i was lucky enough not to have chemo but i'm sure there will be somebody pop in & be able to help you out with anything you need to know I wish you well & keep coming on here to ask questions & have a moan xx
Posts.Title: Im newby here

Posts.Content: I wouldn't dare right him off Helen,he's the toughest person i know & he will fight this to the very end, he's fought every time he's had it for the last 7 years & while there's fight left in him i'll be right beside him all the way & he knows he's got to be here next june for my "sod off please,we don't want to see you again" hospital appointment xx
Posts.Title: Confused daughter

Posts.Content: :-) xx
Posts.Title: Confused daughter

Posts.Content: Thank you Maggie,my parents are brilliant & even though i'm of an age where i should be more than capable of looking after myself they still think i'm their little girl,i've always been a dads girl so this has been hard for me but we'll all pull together & fight or all we're worth xx
Posts.Title: Confused daughter

Posts.Content: Thank you all for taking the time to read & reply to my post,i know dad's cancer is not breast but i feel safe on here & know that people will help if they can We've been tiptoeing through this minefield for 7 years now & you're right Nadjie dad is one tough, stubborn old git & no way is he going down without a fight & i'm going to be right by his side giving them all the love & support i can I have to know what's going on but i won't google anything,i did that once & scared the s**t out of myself Once again,thank you all so much & good luck to everybody on your journey xx
Posts.Title: Confused daughter

Posts.Content: Hi all I know dad doesn't have breast cancer but everybody here has been so kind & helpful i thought here would be a good place to stat my search for information We have been told today he will be having chemo but until mum rings that's all i know,is chemo like a one size fits all & everybody has the same or does where you have it make a difference to what you have xx
Posts.Title: Confused daughter

Posts.Content: Thank you both for answering & thanks for the good wishes G & J,from what mum has said it will either be tablets or a pump that he will have on all the time at home,think i need to go & read literature & see for myself,i do however have a feeling that this is what they call palliative chemo as it's spreading to his bones & they said today this won't cure it just slow it down Oh well,these things are sent to try us & try us they bloody well do xx
Posts.Title: Confused daughter

Posts.Content: Thank you Helen I know it's not going to go away this time & he's been lucky to have had so many successful treatments so far & i also know that if they're prepared to treat him in some way it can extend his life & make it better quality for him xx
Posts.Title: Confused daughter

Posts.Content: Hi MrsShep I don't remember a sore throat but i do remember a sore,red boob,aching ribs & still get short of breath if i walk too fast or too far & hills are a nightmare Good luck for tomorrow & the future Love & hugs xx
Posts.Title: Last radiotherapy tomorrow!

Posts.Content: That's brilliant news xx
Posts.Title: Fantastic News!

Posts.Content: Nice to know there are some happy people out there today,everybody at work has had a face like a slapped arse today,i wasn't sure where to put my not grateful but thankful so i posted it in the scrapbook xx
Posts.Title: Happy and you know it...

Posts.Content: Hi So sorry you're not feeling so good about things,i think we all feel lost when treatment ends & the gap between appointments gets longer,i know i did,you seem to suddenly go from being cosseted & looked after to seemingly left to our own devices & it's scary isn't it,i only saw the consultant befor surgery & have since seen 3 different doctors at follow up appointments & as there are so many nurses at the clinic i attended to begin with you never knew who you would see,i have now been transfered to a smaller hospital nearer home & the last 2 years saw the same doctor & nurse,have you spoken to anybody else about your pain,i would get in touch with your breast unit again & if you get no joy from them go & see your GP or a practice nurse,no matter how hard we try not to we all worry,we wouldn't be human if we didn't I hope you're soon feeling more positive about things xx
Posts.Title: Worried after yearly checkup

Posts.Content: Sorry to hear about your dog sweetie,i'd be devastated if anything happened to our cats Sending you love & hugs  xx
Posts.Title: What is it with cancer?

Posts.Content: Got up this morning to find the dreaded letter with this years mammogram date I know it's a stupid thing to be bothered about & i should be thinking 4 down 1 to go but my heart was filled with dread & fear again xx
Posts.Title: dreaded mammogram date

Posts.Content: Hi Karan Hope all goes well for you next week xx
Posts.Title: dreaded mammogram date

Posts.Content: Hi GillyS Hope all goes well for you next week,it's the waiting that i hate & like you i wish they could say yay or nay on the day xx
Posts.Title: dreaded mammogram date

Posts.Content: Make mine a rose please It will be easy to forget mine for a while as we're toing & froing with dad at the minute so i can't think about me & him at the same time xx
Posts.Title: dreaded mammogram date

Posts.Content: Hi Fiona it's almost 4 years since i was diagnosed & treated so it's work i have to fit in with,i do need to be back by 4 though to collect the other half from work,he doesn't do waiting about after work & is always in a rush to get away i usually have monday & tuesday off so if you tell me what week & day is good for you we'll sort something out Love Carol xx
Posts.Title: Anyone live in or near Notts and fancy meeting for support

Posts.Content: Hi Fiona where do you live & how far could you travel to meet people Carol xx
Posts.Title: Anyone live in or near Notts and fancy meeting for support

Posts.Content: Hi Fiona i live near spalding so if you fancy finding somewhere halfway between me & you sometime i'm game to meet up for a coffee  Love Carol xx
Posts.Title: Anyone live in or near Notts and fancy meeting for support

Posts.Content: Hi Lynda Mammogram not till 17th April,then you get the up to 3 week wait & hospital appointment's 22nd May, i keep thinking it will get easier but it doesn't seem to does it,every year when the letter arrives with the results i put it on the arm of the sofa under a book & pretend it's not there for a few hours,i wish it would come while i was at work so Vince is there when i open it but it never does Hope all is well for you Love & hugs  Carol xx
Posts.Title: dreaded mammogram date

Posts.Content: Hi G n' J Hope all's well with you both It scares the pants off me every year & this year i've also been thinking who will look after me after next year when my 5 years is up & hospital discharges me,it's scary but at the same time it's a sort of comfort blanket Love & hugs Carol xx
Posts.Title: dreaded mammogram date

Posts.Content: Hi honey I won't be much help to you as things for me moved along swiftly as i healed well but i'm sure somebody will be along that has been in the same boat as you,i just wanted to send you a hug & say i hope that scan results are good & that you're soon having your radiotherapy & on the last leg of this journey xx
Posts.Title: Post-surgery waiting for radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Good morning all & i hope the weather is as glorious for you as it is here Just wanted to send everybody an Easter hug & wish you all well xx
Posts.Title: Easter hugs

Posts.Content: Loving the pictures George & Judith,i really need that biker chick on my facebook page,it's sooooo cute xx
Posts.Title: Easter hugs

Posts.Content: Hi Yvonne, i was diagnosed & treated in 2011 & since then our sex life has gone from very little to zero,i don't feel sexy or attractive & am on tamoxifen & antidepressants which seem to dry everything out & make things uncomfortable or painful,i've had several talks to my Vince & his constant answer is "i'd rather have you here to not have sex with than not have you here at all" it used to bother me that i could no longer fulfill that side of things but Vince is happy with lots of cuddles so that makes me happy too,i am 56 & will be more than happy if i never have sex again love Carol xx
Posts.Title: I need to ask a very personal question?

Posts.Content: Sorry,can't help with that one,i've tried on many occasions & can't work out how to do it Well done on your fundraiser today,you are an amazing lady,all that hard work & you still find time for flower arranging,i've been in my pajamas over an hour & had a 20 minute on line relaxation session to wind down after my day xx
Posts.Title: What am I on?

Posts.Content: Hi ladies I have my fingers crossed that you both get good results from your biopsies,i was very lucky & only had to wait a week for mine but that was the longest week of my life I wish you both luck with results & all the future holds for you xx
Posts.Title: Biopsy today - waiting for results again!

Posts.Content: Hi Susie I don'r remember seeing a link but i just googled crocheted monkey & there's a site called jungle animals that has one,unfortunately i'm rubbish at all this technology & don't know how to put a link to it on here,hope this has helped you xx
Posts.Title: I could be wrong

Posts.Content: Thanks George,that's the site i was looking at,i'm not sure whether i like the bag or not xx
Posts.Title: I could be wrong

Posts.Content: If you have a sicknote then you're not fit for work & if you go in to work you're not covered on the insurance,stay off work until you feel up to it when all your treatment is finished xx
Posts.Title: Unsympathetic manager

Posts.Content: Hi ladies I have my fingers crossed that you both get good results from your biopsies,i was very lucky & only had to wait a week for mine but that was the longest week of my life I wish you both luck with results & all the future holds for you xx
Posts.Title: Biopsy today - waiting for results again!

Posts.Content: Hi Wendy I had same tests & chat when i went for my pre-op assessment & no chat about surgery either but i did go back the following week to talk to the nurse & make sure i understood what was going to be done, if it was me i would keep phoning your nurse until you get an answer & a time to go in & talk about your surgery xx
Posts.Title: NO DISCUSSION

Posts.Content: Hello everybody I know what herceptin is as i watched a film about it,i hope you don,t mind me asking but what does sub cut mean xx
Posts.Title: Sub-cut herceptin

Posts.Content: Hi,i'm also at the 4 year stage & have any amount of aches & pains,i had a brilliant doctor (now retired) who was always sympathetic & had time to listen when i went to see her,if i was in the least bit worried about anything she would send me for blood tests or xrays to put my mind at rest,don't suffer in silence,go see the doctor or your breast nurse & ask questions,tell them how worried you are & hopefully you'll get it sorted out xx
Posts.Title: 4 years post diagnosis but still aches and pains

Posts.Content: Hello Denise,so pleased you're having a lovely time away & are doing ok xx
Posts.Title: Just saying hello ....

Posts.Content: Fanflippintastic,welcome to the paddock xx
Posts.Title: Another Neddy passes the finish post!

Posts.Content: Hi Gina Sending you love & hugs to help you on this journey we are all travelling,hope all goes well for you xx
Posts.Title: It's confirmed.....cancer

Posts.Content: I've just been in the range & they have loads ranging from £1.99 up to £10.99 xx
Posts.Title: Adult colouring books

Posts.Content: Just got home from a meal out,i had mackerel fillets with gooseberry sauce,chips & peas followed by fresh fruit meringue & icecream with a couple of glasses or rose xx
Posts.Title: What a difference

Posts.Content: Hi George I certainly have & as you can imagine it caused great excitement & a few tears to see our friend on top of the podium,looks like Guy will forever be the bridesmaid,reading between the lines i think that this will be his last season xx
Posts.Title: What a difference

Posts.Content: That's fantastic xx
Posts.Title: Positive News

Posts.Content: We couldn't have had a better end to dads birthday celebrations,he's a really nice bloke,just hopeing that Jamie Hammilton will be ok,he started racing in the same club as bro & Ivan as a 14 year old & was in the same class as my brother & when Jamie's bike was sick one meeting Mick lent him his second bike which Jamie won the race on & got rid of his orange jacket,happy days xx
Posts.Title: What a difference

Posts.Content: Was a lovely gesture when Hutchy thanked surgeon that saved his leg after one of his race wins,you have to admire that young mad They both did,dad back in the 70's & brother not so many years ago,he retired in 2006,last meeting was at cadwell & very emotional,sounds like you may well have seen both of them racing then if you went to club meetings xx
Posts.Title: What a difference

Posts.Content: It was gorgeous,i'd gone with the intention of having lasagne but when i saw that i changed my mind, belly is far too full to even contemplate a bag of sweets but i might just manage a shot of honey JD befor i go to bed xx
Posts.Title: What a difference

Posts.Content: Fanflippintastic news,fingers crossed for mondays results xx
Posts.Title: NEDdy

Posts.Content: fantastic picture of the cat,just what i needed to make me laugh on such a miserable day x
Posts.Title: Music Fans : pics to bring a smile :-)

Posts.Content: Fantastic news,so pleased you're doing well xx
Posts.Title: finished

Posts.Content: That's fantastic,does she have a page on just giving that i can donate to for her I don't have the energy for walking or running anymore more so i do coffee mornings,cheese & wine evenings & next month am doing a strawberry tea for breast cancer care,cutting cake & buttering bread is much more up my street these days xx
Posts.Title: Race for Life

Posts.Content: Good luck to you all xx
Posts.Title: Race for Life

Posts.Content: Lol,can't beat the daft jokes to cheer you up Pleased op over & done with & i wish you good luck with the rest of your journey xx
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy done...Hoorah...Onward and upward ;-)

Posts.Content: Morning Mrs D hope you're soon feeling better,don't you just love it when doctors use proper words that we understand,but not in good nick was a strange way to put it Hope all goes when with scan etc Weather grim here so it's a good book,tea & biscuits for me & a bit of knitting when i've hoovered the room Love & hugs xx
Posts.Title: Hi there ladies.

Posts.Content: Omg,i loved hot chocolate,saw them at odeon in boston many years ago,we were at the front & he looked so yummy xx
Posts.Title: Hot chocolate

Posts.Content: Hi all,not been around much lately & i'm just checking in to see what's going on & this caught my eye,i'm all for fundraising & have done my bit in many ways but i really don't like this way one little bit,i was lucky & didn't have to have chemo but i know people that did & are now going through it,one of them is my dad & even though inside he's still the same person & i love him with all my heart when i saw him for the first time after he lost his hair it broke my heart as he no longer looks like dad,3 years ago a friend shaved her hair off & i begged her not to do it,yes she raised some money for a worthy cause but watching it being done made me feel so sad as all i could think about were all the people crying because they were losing their hair by the handfull everytime they combed it or washed it or were finding great chunks on their pillow when they woke up every morning,would i brave the shave,no way,give me a nice coffee morning,cheese & wine evening any day xx
Posts.Title: Does anyone else dislike the Macmillan Brave the Shave campaign?

Posts.Content: Yes i am,sorry,you weren't talking about me,when you said you sexy thing were you There was just something about him that made you go aaah & sort of melt,Anders Limpar made me feel like that everytime i watched the gunners xx
Posts.Title: Hot chocolate

Posts.Content: Hi all Lovely pics Judith,does a girl good to know you're on the case when we need a pick me up,love the booby,much better than the one i have to put on display on friday!! xx
Posts.Title: Not receiving emails from Macmillan/ who's a pretty. boy!!

Posts.Content: Thankfully i'm no longer a blue tit or a redbreast but good luck to anybody out there who is either or both xx
Posts.Title: Not receiving emails from Macmillan/ who's a pretty. boy!!

Posts.Content: Hi Ali,hope bloods are ok & all goes well tomorrow love Carol xx
Posts.Title: injections

Posts.Content: I've just realised i'm not getting any emails either Judith xx
Posts.Title: Not receiving emails from Macmillan/ who's a pretty. boy!!

Posts.Content: Hoorah,i now know that all are still here & the tits & breast are doing ok & changing colour as they should be  xx
Posts.Title: Not receiving emails from Macmillan/ who's a pretty. boy!!

Posts.Content: Brilliant news,so pleased for you xx
Posts.Title: Good news for a change

Posts.Content: Morning Wendy & everybody else here this morning I'm having my four year mammogram on friday,i had lumpectomy,5 nodes (or it might have been 7) removed followed by radiotherapy & am now on tamoxifen,i have no idea what all the numbers & letters meant when i was diagnosed & as i didn't have a lovely George (bit posh today with our full titles) to help me out i just called it Doris It's a scarey journey we're all on but there are some wonderful people on this site & i have had lots of help,hugs & reasurance,don't be frightened to come on here & ask questions or say when you just need a hug as there is always somebody here to help Love Carol xx P.S Hi Ali Hope you have a good day at work & i'm in sister mode again,don't do too much & have a rest when you get home xx
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed and need to read something positive

Posts.Content: Hi I do wonder about people sometimes,they have no idea of the effects this has on our mental wellbeing as well as all the tests,operations & treatments we have to go through,i had several people tell me that i was lucky it was found early & that i didn't need chemo,yes i was very lucky but when you have a sore boob from 2 operations in the same place & you feel sick worrying about what's coming next you don't feel so lucky I hope that you get good news when you next go to the clinic & that you only need a lumpectomy, good luck with all your future treatments Love & hugs xx
Posts.Title: Feeling a bit lost

Posts.Content: Hi everybody Got home today to find my mammogram results on the door mat & all is well,no abnormalities,yippee, $ down and one to go Love & hugs to all xx
Posts.Title: Yippeeeeeee

Posts.Content: Bless ya,i raised £182 today at the coffee morning xx
Posts.Title: Yippeeeeeee

Posts.Content: Thank you all,your support & friendship means so much to me & i couldn't have done today without that xx
Posts.Title: Yippeeeeeee

Posts.Content: Hi Ellen Hope you managed to get back to sleep,everybody on here knows what the wee small hours are like I worked up to 2 days befor my surgery & if it's at all possible would advice anybody to carry on as normal for as long as you can,due to the type of work i do & the times of treatment i had to take time off after surgery but everybody is different & you have to take the advice of your doctors & nurses I wish you well with your treatment etc & if there's anything you need to askthere will always be somebody here that can help Love Carol xx
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed and need to read something positive

Posts.Content: Thank you & thank you for being there when i was a grumpy xx
Posts.Title: Yippeeeeeee

Posts.Content: Fantastic news,am so pleased for you both xx
Posts.Title: Good news! Mum got the all clear after surgery!

Posts.Content: Oh Grogg you poor sausage,i broke my foot 2 years ago so you have my sympathy,so frustrating that you can't do stuff,i hope everybody will rally round & let you get plenty of rest while you order them about xx
Posts.Title: Leg in plaster

Posts.Content: Hi MrsShep You are feeling the same as everybody else does when the follow up appointments come round,i've just had my 4 year mammogram & the waiting was just as bad this time as it was for the first one & even though i know all is ok i'm still worried about my clinic appointment,you are only human & you wouldn't be normal if you didn't worry Love & hugs & good wishes for the future xx
Posts.Title: Why am I so scared

Posts.Content: Sending you love & hugs Pat & hope all goes well tomorrow xx
Posts.Title: Mastectomy tomorrow, 9-9-15

Posts.Content: Hi  Bev lucky you getting the new style gown,i had the old one & on a particulaly bad day pit it on the wrong way round so it wasn't my bum that was on display,mind you by that pint so many people had looked at,prodded & poked my boob i was beyond careing George my little lovely how long do me tattoos take to fade cus mine look same as they did when i had them done Love & hugs to you all Carol xx
Posts.Title: Markers

Posts.Content: Hi to you both thanks George,that explains why after almost 4 years i still have mine,it wasn't a . that i got,must have had plenty of spare ink the day i was there love & hugs to you both Carol xx
Posts.Title: Markers

Posts.Content: Well that's my mission for today accomplished then,i have decided that i will make 1 person a day smile :)  i kept bottom half on but like i said that was a particularly bad day,i woke up crying & had triffle & chocolate cake for breakfast & for some reason put a dress on! & on one occasion had what i thought was a nice sensible skirt on only to find i had to hitch it up round my knickers,oh the embarasment & as your bra's in a basket on a chair nobody can see that for the first time in weeks they actually match sending big hugs Carol xx
Posts.Title: Markers

Posts.Content: Hi all just got home from a day on the coast & am laughing at the size of dot comparisons mine are both the same size (one each side) & i have to be a bit careful what top i wear as the one inbetween my boobs looks like an enormous black head Love & hugs Carol xx
Posts.Title: Markers

Posts.Content: Hi  Bev lucky you getting the new style gown,i had the old one & on a particulaly bad day pit it on the wrong way round so it wasn't my bum that was on display,mind you by that pint so many people had looked at,prodded & poked my boob i was beyond careing George my little lovely how long do me tattoos take to fade cus mine look same as they did when i had them done Love & hugs to you all Carol xx
Posts.Title: Markers

Posts.Content: Hi to you both thanks George,that explains why after almost 4 years i still have mine,it wasn't a . that i got,must have had plenty of spare ink the day i was there love & hugs to you both Carol xx
Posts.Title: Markers

Posts.Content: Hi all just got home from a day on the coast & am laughing at the size of dot comparisons mine are both the same size (one each side) & i have to be a bit careful what top i wear as the one inbetween my boobs looks like an enormous black head Love & hugs Carol xx
Posts.Title: Markers

Posts.Content: Well that's my mission for today accomplished then,i have decided that i will make 1 person a day smile :)  i kept bottom half on but like i said that was a particularly bad day,i woke up crying & had triffle & chocolate cake for breakfast & for some reason put a dress on! & on one occasion had what i thought was a nice sensible skirt on only to find i had to hitch it up round my knickers,oh the embarasment & as your bra's in a basket on a chair nobody can see that for the first time in weeks they actually match sending big hugs Carol xx
Posts.Title: Markers

Posts.Content: Sending you a massive hug Fiona,i'm 4 years down the line & still think every little ache is a return,my arthritic lumps are bone cancer,my cough's lung cancer,i have a shocking memory & get words muddled,brain tumor or it might be dementia,i do believe that once our lives has been touched by this disease we worry more than we did befor,i try not to  & now try to think that what will be will be,we can't change things so must make the best of what we have,please talk to somebody about how you're feeling,i did & through my breast unit had long chats with the most wonderful lady Love & hugs Carol xx
Posts.Title: Feeling Morbid

Posts.Content: Hi Fiona Have a fabulous weekend away,you deserve it,where in Lincolnshire are you heading to xx
Posts.Title: Feeling Morbid

Posts.Content: I don't get copies of letters either xx
Posts.Title: which diagnosis is right ?

Posts.Content: Hi  I too had a nipple change after rads which turned out to be a side effect not mentioned in my booklet Hope all's well when you get it checked xx
Posts.Title: Surgey and Radiotherapy completed what next???

Posts.Content: Evening ladies Munch1999,congratulations on your good results & what a thoughtful,loving stepdaughter you have Veritas,i hope things go well for you too,my first mammogram was hell too,i think i had 4 done on my left boobie,boy was i happy to put my bra back on that day,i've recently had my 4 year one & i've found that although it's still not pleasant each year seems to get a little less uncomfortable Best wishes to you both xx
Posts.Title: Year on mammogram coming up

Posts.Content: I did but don't ask how many as i can't remember,the feeling in my fingers came back but i do sometimes get pins & needles which my GP said is nothing to worry about & my scar & a patch on my arm are still numb,i was also told not to have injections or blood taken in that arm but never bothered to ask why xx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy side effects

Posts.Content: Hi Sarah I too had pains in the boobie & arm & i also had some numbness in my fingers,when i ask hospital about this they said it was perfectly normal & could last for some time after treatment had finished but if you're worried ring your hospital & talk to your nurse or the radiotherapy department I think the deodorant depends on where you live as it seems to change from county to county xx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy side effects

Posts.Content: That's fantastic news,i'm so pleased for you xx
Posts.Title: Result of first mammogram today ...

Posts.Content: So pleased all is well with you Susie,beef wellington sounds very nice,we had takeaway xx
Posts.Title: Sunday afternoon

Posts.Content: Hi Emily I'm pleased mum is carrying on as normal & that you are feeling better about things,hopefully your sister will some be in the same frame of mind as you At the moment her op seems an age away but believe me the weeks will rush past & before you know it the big day will be here & in the blink of an eye mum will be on the road to recovery You are doing a great job & just knowing they can ring anytime they want will be a big help to your parents We are all here to help in anyway we can Sending love & hugs to you all xx
Posts.Title: One week on..........Thank you!

Posts.Content: Fantastic news Ali,i'm really pleased for you xx
Posts.Title: 1st year mammogram

Posts.Content: Bless you,i do believe we all have days like this,i know i did & even now i get a bit down about what happened,when i was first diagnosed i had a dislike for 2 women called Doris (no offence meant to anybody on here called Doris,they were particularly horrible people) so i called my lump Doris & she had to go to make me feel happy again & get better.The waiting is always the worst part,weeks seem to last forever & try as we might we still worry don't we I'm sending you a big careful hug to make you feel better xx
Posts.Title: Tearful

Posts.Content: Well please excuse my language but what an utter bastard,how could anybody be so cruel & lead you on like that,there are some horrible people out there & they have no idea what we go through,if they did they wouldn't do such a dispicable thing,i do hope you can get something sorted out,i though the council were duty bound to find you that was fit for you to live in while you had your treatment,i clearly got that one wrong xx
Posts.Title: let down again

Posts.Content: Sorry to see about your sister in law mrs D.hope she soon gets appointment & started on her journey Hope you had a lovely time at your LGFG today Love & hugs xx
Posts.Title: First Rads.

Posts.Content: That's fantastic news,i'm so pleased for you xx
Posts.Title: Mastectomy 3 weeks ago & now Cancer Free! Yipee!!

Posts.Content: Love it George xx
Posts.Title: Slimming world/ weightwatchers while on Chemo??

Posts.Content: Brilliant news lovely lady,hope you feel like exercising quicker than i did,i'm still thinking about doing some exercise 4 years later xx
Posts.Title: Finished Radiotherapy !

Posts.Content: Thank you all so much,what a lovely end to a lovely day,spoilt rotten & bargains to be had in Camden can't be bad Happy birthday to you too JJ Love & hugs to all xx
Posts.Title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY !!!!!

Posts.Content: Well done to you both,i've opened the stable doors for all the new Neddys,come on in & pick a stall xx
Posts.Title: Yippee I did it.

Posts.Content: Thank you all so much,what a lovely end to a lovely day,spoilt rotten & bargains to be had in Camden can't be bad Happy birthday to you too JJ Love & hugs to all xx
Posts.Title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY !!!!!

Posts.Content: hi,i have been on tamoxifen for almost 4 years & have found that my hair & nails grow & look nice for a while then stop growing,my hair looks terrible & my nails are brittle & break & flake,i have regular blood tests to make sure there's nothing amiss but my gp is sure this is all part of the treatment but i would take Georges advice & get tests done just to make sure xx
Posts.Title: Fingernails!

Posts.Content: Anything except a mars bar but it i had to choose turkish delight & a crunchie & a bar of fruit & nut & a snickers & a bag of maltesers & a bag of any m & m's xx
Posts.Title: Diet & Chocolate for nutritional purposes ;-D

Posts.Content: Hi It's still early days for you following your operation,i had discomfort for several weeks after my surgery, try to take things a little steady & don't over stretch,you can ring your bc nurse & ask there advice if you want further reasurance Love & hugs xx
Posts.Title: breast dancer er positive

Posts.Content: Turkish delight thins & i can eat a box to myself in one sitting xx
Posts.Title: The perfect chocolate

Posts.Content: I never feel naughty about eating chocolate or drinking wine Please tell me you're joking Ali,i thought everybody knew about chocolate Freddos xx
Posts.Title: Diet & Chocolate for nutritional purposes ;-D

Posts.Content: Better get my lazy but out of bed & off to B&M tomorrow & get stoked up xx
Posts.Title: The perfect chocolate

Posts.Content: Most supermarkets do their own,i've found the best ones are sainsburys closely followed by tesco xx
Posts.Title: The perfect chocolate

Posts.Content: What a delicious sight to wake up to this morning xx
Posts.Title: The perfect chocolate

Posts.Content: It's a shop,B&M bargains,you can get pretty much anything there xx
Posts.Title: The perfect chocolate

Posts.Content: From the mouths of babes,don't you just love them my nephew once had his bits & pieces in a sponge when he was in the bath,he said it was to stop it drowning & yes i did remind him about it on his 21st birthday xx
Posts.Title: A smile to start today.

Posts.Content: From the mouths of babes,don't you just love them my nephew once had his bits & pieces in a sponge when he was in the bath,he said it was to stop it drowning & yes i did remind him about it on his 21st birthday xx
Posts.Title: A smile to start today.

Posts.Content: That made me proper laugh Ali,does that mean what i had wasn't proper as from the start everybody said "well you don't look ill" when i told them i was off sick xx
Posts.Title: stupid comments part 1!!!!!

Posts.Content: Wow,that's a brilliant thing to share,always lovely to hear positive news xx
Posts.Title: Positive news

Posts.Content: Morning ladies I too was hypersensitive when i was diagnosed & going through treatment & every advert seemed to be related to cancer,i am now 4 years down the line & can assure you all that you still notice them but not in the way you are doing now,it does get easier I also read the article yesterday & was hurt by the comment about cancer sufferers being attention seekers,i was also angered by the person that seemed to think we should all be looking at alternative therapies,i don't use face book but i know that it can be a place of great support to those who do Sending you all love & hugs & good wishes for you journey xx
Posts.Title: Adverts!!

Posts.Content: As far as i can remember taken ibuprofen isn't a problem with radiotherapy but i would just ask them when you go again xx
Posts.Title: taking ibuprofen during radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Are you sure you wouldn't prefer a mini Pollywog Mary xx
Posts.Title: Dogs (man's best friends)

Posts.Content: That's fantastic news,so pleased for you xx
Posts.Title: 2 Year Check Up

Posts.Content: Hi Flower I hope tomorrow goes well for you Hopefully the radio interview will done good for you ball & you'll have offers of help & people wanting tickets xx
Posts.Title: Not Had A Good Day (apart from a special event talking about Cancer...

Posts.Content: Hi Alicemay I'm sending you a big hug & good wishes for next weds,i have my 4 year mammogram in 3 weeks & i'm terrified but told my other half i'm not bothered so he doesn't worry about me Love & hugs xx
Posts.Title: Mammogram

Posts.Content: Hello Should everybody on tablets for 5 years have a bone density scan or am i ok without one on tamoxifen,i'm a bit bothered now as i've not had one xx
Posts.Title: Quick question.

Posts.Content: I find it amazing how things can be so different from hospital to hospital,you'd think treatment & after care would be a bog standard thing xx
Posts.Title: Quick question.

Posts.Content: Flipping Nora,if you live 1 side & work the other that's 15 quid a week,what a rip off,i find no pleasure in driving but since i left the last job & started my new ones i need to to get from one to the other & after my experiences over the last few weeks you're better off not driving,today alone 4 cars & a cyclist went over a red light,3 people walked over a crossing while it was on the red man & a stupid mare on her phone & sorting her hair out at the same time came onto my side of the road & nearly hit me head on,give me a bus any day xx
Posts.Title: Quick question.

Posts.Content: Pleased all went well today Pat,pity you can't get a cheap weekly pass for the bridge like you can for buses,i've not been over it for about 6 years,how much is it now  xx
Posts.Title: Quick question.

Posts.Content: Thank you,i shall stop fretting now xx
Posts.Title: Quick question.

Posts.Content: Hi 58 petals,i just wanted to let you know that there is a light at the end of the tunnel,4 years ago i was where you are now,i had lumpectomy,node removal,second op for clear margins & have been on poxyfen,sorry tamoxifen for since radiotherapy finished,everybody on here understands your fears & are all here to help,ask any question you want & somebody will be here to help Sending love & hugs & i wish you well on your journey xx
Posts.Title: Diagnosed yesterday...

Posts.Content: Hi Ali,didn't know it was today,for some reason i had next week in my head,think i may be going bonkers,sorry to see you're not feeling so good,hope you're soon feeling better,love Carol xx
Posts.Title: WORLD CANCER DAY

Posts.Content: Bonbonlarue People are so insensitive sometimes & speak befor they think,they think that everything can be made better but we all know that's not true I wish you well & many more months of good palliative care Love & hugs xx
Posts.Title: Is it just me ...

Posts.Content: Sorry sweetheart,i didn't mean to upset or offend,i would never dream of trivialising any form of cancer,my dad has incurable secondaries in his liver,spleen & bones & we have no idea how much longer his treatment will give him,i'm struggling with how to word what i want to say,like you say most people have a sugar coated view of cancer treatments & think everybody gets better & i do think there should be more adverts that say this isn't the case & that more funds & research is needed to find out why secondary cancers occur but i don't know how this can be done without upsetting people that are finding it difficult to cope with their situation,god i so hope i've put that right,i'm useless at righting stuff down xx
Posts.Title: Is it just me ...

Posts.Content: Thank you all for the kind things you have said,i didn't think about needing somebody that's been there to help you when you want to know what each step is feels like Love & hugs to all xx
Posts.Title: Is it just me ...

Posts.Content: Well i've got all day monday & tuesday if you want to tell me Dad's in very capable hands,it's his birthday next week so they've delayed starting his treatment till the week after so he can enjoy that,then we'll just take each day as it comes & see what happens xx
Posts.Title: Is it just me ...

Posts.Content: Love it Helen,proper laugh out load moment,almost as bad as my mum with her nymphnodes xx
Posts.Title: bird watching

Posts.Content: How do you know if you're positive or negative xx
Posts.Title: Cold milled flaxseeda-can you help

Posts.Content: Thank you,it's a while now since i started on this journey & i can't remember everything they told me, i'm on tamoxifen so i guess that makes me a + xx
Posts.Title: Cold milled flaxseeda-can you help

Posts.Content: Tough call this one Yes i'm all for bringing any cancer awareness to peoples attention but it should be done in a way that is not upsetting to the people watching it,not everybody is strong enough to cope with watching something like that but once you've started it isn't always easy to turn it off till you get to the end,i can't even cope with the macmillan advert some days xx
Posts.Title: Is it just me ...

Posts.Content: I am for years down the line & now starting to think about planning my "yippee i'm done" weekend but i still wonder everyday if it will be that or "oh bugger,here we go again" everybody here has the same fears & worries & we don't need to see something upsetting to remind us about it I have been toying with the idea of leaving the site as i don't feel i belong here,my journey is almost over but for so many of you it's just begining I have had so much support & met new & treasured friends Good luck to you all Love & hugs xx
Posts.Title: Is it just me ...

Posts.Content: hope all goes well for all you ladies having second ops to clear margins  love Carol xx
Posts.Title: fingers crossed

Posts.Content: Fantastic news,i shall raise a glass to you tonight xx
Posts.Title: I did it too!

Posts.Content: Ali i am so sorry you didn't get the news you had hoped for,i wish you well for the future & for any treatment,op etc that you have in the future xx
Posts.Title: Disappointment

Posts.Content: Ali i am so sorry you didn't get the news you had hoped for,i wish you well for the future & for any treatment,op etc that you have in the future xx
Posts.Title: Disappointment
